item.title: [DISTRELEC-5583] Checkout Step2 - Payment options icons
item.description:
Requirement
The payment icons should be placed on the same line like the text. On the left side of 50% width of the choose payment box. Please refer to the screenshot.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5570] DE // Search result page - Price notification
item.description:
Could you please add the following remark on top of the search result list.
The remark should only appear when the customers are logged in.
If not, the text and the gap should not be there.

DE:
"Kundenspezifische Preise werden auf Produktseite und Warenkorb angezeigt"
EN:
"Customer specific prices are displayed on productpages or in the cart

Position: 10px distance from Icons / 10px distance from search result list
Font Size: 10px
item.summary: DE // Search result page - Price notification

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deploy.
(Result attached)
Font size increased to 12px, as 10px was extremely small (hardly readable)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5563] DE // Basket cannot be calculated
item.description:
I have created an open order (1000000321) with user distrelec.testing+de.b2b.1@gmail.com

When I'm trying to add an additional product to this order with user distrelec.testing+de.b2b.1.2@gmail.com I've been redirected to the cart after the step 2 and I get the following error message:
Cart cannot recalculated. Try it again in a few minutes.

To test use the following account:
User: distrelec.testing+de.b2b.1.2@gmail.com
Password: Distrelec14

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Evangelos
during the open order calculation with the following request:

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
	<soap:Body>
		<ns2:OpenOrderCalculationRequest xmlns:ns2="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
			<salesOrganization>7350</salesOrganization>
			<orderId>1000000321</orderId>
			<simulateOrder>true</simulateOrder>
			<contactId>0000329651</contactId>
			<newOrderEntries>
				<materialNumber>14022002</materialNumber>
				<quantity>1</quantity>
				<freeGiftPromotion>false</freeGiftPromotion>
			</newOrderEntries>
			<freeShippingPromotion>false</freeShippingPromotion>
			<orderCloseDate>20141031</orderCloseDate>
			<editableByAllContacts>false</editableByAllContacts>
		</ns2:OpenOrderCalculationRequest>
	</soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

this error occurs:

Sales document 1000000321 was not changed

Hello Francesco,
This order had been rejected and this is the reason why no changes can take place. I have asked my developer to exclude them from the interface there.

Correction here. In the order history we return that this order is cancelled. Should this somehow be filtered from the webshop?
I will make no changes in our interface at the moment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4750] Insert correct Icons
item.description:
Based on DISTRELEC-4581:
@Jan: please insert the correct Icons as soon as they will be delievered. Please keep in mind, that the feature branch is closed and the code is reaintegrated in v2.0.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Florian,

Please assign back to me, when you receive the icons.

Thanks, Jan

Here are the icons.
Please let me know if you need special formats etc.

Hi Florian,

I need the icons in a format of maximum 34 x 34 px in .png file format and also I need a black and a white version of the icon to build the hover states.

BR Jan
can be tested after the next deployment.
